items.sentence: Tom\'s son, John, also works as an officer with the Boston police.
Do you know whether or not Tom plans to go to Boston next weekend?
Tom has been babysitting our children whenever we\'re out of town.
Tom took a piece of paper out of his pocket and handed it to Mary.
Tom wondered if Mary could be persuaded teach his children French.
My fear of making another mistake is why I\'m being extra careful.
I hope that you\'re the one that\'s going to be doing the driving.
Tom was at his ex-wife\'s house at the time his wife was murdered.
Tom, would you please give these starving people something to eat?
Tom doesn\'t really want to talk about this, but he has no choice.
